attributes.action: Make Magistrates accountable to local residents through election rather than by application.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Magistrates rarely appear to support ordinary families, preferring to lean more towards the 'rights' of those charged with crimes, often against the wishes of the police and victims. 

My home town is blighted by a criminal gang breaking down front doors and threatening families with guns and knives. Recently 2 men were charged with aggravatd burglary and released on bail by Magistrates who clearly live in a different world to the rest of us. 

The present system will never support ordinary, law-abiding families, until Magistrates are elected rather than 'chosen'. 

Ordinary people, living in ordinary towns and villages, need protection!
